(Roaklin, because JP isn't that angry it seems, I don't think any punishment 
will be given out, but if you ever play out someone elses character without 
permission, the rules will be enforced against you very harshly)

Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/The Oblitercons:



Nemesis Enforcer nodded to Zardus, transforming to his bat mode and following 
Zardus.

---

Dark One entered the Alliance base along with his comrades.  Upon heading for 
their quarters, they all heard voices coming from a room.  Entering it, they 
found Scattershot talking to DeathStorm's head.

"What are you doing!" Dark One yelled, kicking the head out of Scattershot's 
hands, the kick sending DeathStorm's head slamming into the wall.

"NOOOOOO!"  

Dark One picked up the head, kicking it out of the room.  "We will guard the 
prisoners, you incompitent fool.  You, go to the bridge and keep defenses at 
full.  Keep continuous scans going."

"Fine, you Cybertronian Quintesson!" Scattershot yelled, putting DeathStorm 
on his head like a hat, leaving the room and heading for the bridge.

"Why Zardus let him join is beyond me." Hiss said, shaking his head.
